channel.title: Prada on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Prada on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Prada Foundation Film Fund Launches at Venice Film Festival
item.description: Italy’s Fondazione Prada, on Monday at the Venice Film Festival, officially launched its film fund to sustain independent cinema from around the world without any restrictions on theme, genre, or lang

item.title: Prada Foundation Film Fund Launches at Venice Film Festival
item.description: Italy’s Fondazione Prada, on Monday at the Venice Film Festival, officially launched its film fund to sustain independent cinema from around the world without any restrictions on theme, genre, or lang

item.title: Tom Holland Swings His Way to Prada Partnership as Face of New Paradigme Fragrance
item.description: The luxury fashion house confirmed the Holland news today, calling it a “fragrance that transcends traditional preconceptions by asking — what if there’s another way?”

item.title: Tom Holland Swings His Way to Prada Partnership as Face of New Paradigme Fragrance
item.description: The luxury fashion house confirmed the Holland news today, calling it a “fragrance that transcends traditional preconceptions by asking — what if there’s another way?”

item.title: Alejandro G. Iñárritu and Prada Foundation Team on Installation Celebrating 25th Anniversary of ‘Amores Perros’ That Will Travel to L.A.
item.description: Italy’s Prada Foundation has announced it is mounting a film installation by Oscar-winning Mexican director Alejandro G. Iñárritu to celebrate the 25th anniversary of his first feature “Amores Perros.

item.title: Alejandro G. Iñárritu and Prada Foundation Team on Installation Celebrating 25th Anniversary of ‘Amores Perros’ That Will Travel to L.A.
